com.tilisty.views

Class TilistyView

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application
      • com.tilisty.views.TilistyView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IObserver

    public class TilistyView
extends Application
implements IObserver
    The base JavaFX application for the Tilisty app. Manages the parent layout for the tree view and the properties view.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jason Simpson

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start(Stage stage)
        Render the view. This method gets invoked automatically by JavaFX. It sets up the TilistyTreeView and the PropertyPanel (the two major components of the UI). It also delegates from the tree view to the property panel when a new view is selected.
        See Also:
        TilistyTreeView, PropertyPanel
